short.ar: إضافة المزيد من الأدوات والخيارات إلى واتس أب ويب لمزيد من الخصوصية والفعالية.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Add more tools and options for WhatsApp Web for more privacy and reliability.
short.es: Agrega más herramientas y opciones para WhatsApp Web para obtener más privacidad y confiabilidad.
short.fr: Ajouter plus d'outils et d'options à Whatsapp Web pour plus de confidentialité et fiabilité.
short.pt_BR: Adicione mais ferramentas e opções ao seu WhatsApp Web para mais privacidade e confiabilidade.
short.ru: Дополнительные инструменты для WhatsApp Web, с конфиденциальностью и надежностью.
short.tr: Daha fazla gizlilik ve güvenlik için WhatsApp Web için daha çok araç ve seçenek ekleyin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA Customizer Plus lets you customize your WhatsApp Web experience with more options for better usability and privacy for personal and business use.

This customization tool for WhatsApp Web is available for
- Yearly Plan - INR 3000/-
- Lifetime Plan - INR 5500/-

If you like this chrome extension, consider sharing your review with us. Your support will help us make this extension more robust.

For any issues related to the WA Customizer Plus, then feel free to reach out to us on info@soletstalkdigital.com.


DISCLAIMER:
This Chrome plugin is NOT endorsed or certified by WhatsApp Inc and is merely an unofficial customization tool that works with WhatsApp Web.
The privacy of the users is important to us. We don’t broadcast, sell, share or distribute any user collected data. The extension was designed to keep privacy of our users in mind. For more information, read:

SoLetsTalkDigital privacy policy: https://soletstalkapp.com/privacy
Razorpay privacy policy: https://razorpay.com/privacy/
